column2: Found dead by mouse technician; T1-between ears; necropsied but very far gone
DCT-TVA; Braf ca; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, heart, lungs, kidney, spleen, liver, tumor
Found dead by mouse technician; T1-between ears; necropsied but very far gone
Skull in tact but brain had started disintegrated. Removed and place in zinc fixative but not sure analysis will be able to be done.
Tumor was too small and mouse was too far dead to take any cryogenics or cell lines.
